016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.day7;
017
018import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.DataSource;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.util.Iterator;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.Map.Entry;
024import java.util.function.Function;
025import java.util.function.IntUnaryOperator;
026import java.util.regex.Matcher;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028import java.util.stream.Collectors;
029import java.util.stream.Stream;
030
031public class CamelCard {
032
033  private static final Pattern HAND_BID_EXTRACTOR = Pattern.compile("(\\S+)\\s+(\\d+)");
034
035  private final Map<Hand, Integer> hands;
036
037  public CamelCard(boolean jackIsWild) throws IOException {
038    this(DataSource.DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE, jackIsWild);
039  }
040
041  public CamelCard(String inputFile, boolean jackIsWild) throws IOException {
042    try (Stream<String> lines = DataSource.simpleLines(inputFile, this)) {
043      hands = lines
044          .map(HAND_BID_EXTRACTOR::matcher)
045          .filter(Matcher::matches)
046          .collect(Collectors.toMap((matcher) -> new Hand(matcher.group(1), jackIsWild),
047              (matcher) -> Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(2))));
048    }
049  }
050
051  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
052    System.out.println(new CamelCard(false).getWinnings());
053    System.out.println(new CamelCard(true).getWinnings());
054  }
055
056  public int getWinnings() {
057    int[] count = {1};
058    return hands
059        .entrySet()
060        .stream()
061        .sorted(Entry.comparingByKey())
062        .mapToInt((entry) -> count[0]++ * entry.getValue())
063        .sum();
064  }
065
066  private static class Hand implements Comparable<Hand> {
067
068    private static final char JACK = 'J';
069    private static final Map<Character, Integer> FACE_CARD_VALUES = Map.ofEntries(
070        Map.entry('T', 10),
071        Map.entry('J', 11),
072        Map.entry('Q', 12),
073        Map.entry('K', 13),
074        Map.entry('A', 14)
075    );
076
077    private final String cards;
078    private final IntUnaryOperator cardEvaluator;
079    private final List<Integer> counts;
080
081    public Hand(String cards, boolean jackIsWild) {
082      this.cards = cards;
083      cardEvaluator = (card) -> cardValue((char) card, jackIsWild);
084      Map<Integer, Long> frequencies = computeFrequencies(cards);
085      counts = compileGroupCounts(frequencies, jackIsWild);
086    }
087
088    @SuppressWarnings("NullableProblems")
089    @Override
090    public int compareTo(Hand other) {
091      int comparison = compareGroups(other);
092      if (comparison == 0) {
093        comparison = compareCards(other);
094      }
095      return comparison;
096    }
097
098    private int compareGroups(Hand other) {
099      Iterator<Integer> thisIterator = counts.iterator();
100      Iterator<Integer> otherIterator = other.counts.iterator();
101      int comparison = 0;
102      while (thisIterator.hasNext() && otherIterator.hasNext() && comparison == 0) {
103        comparison = thisIterator.next() - otherIterator.next();
104      }
105      return comparison;
106    }
107
108    private int compareCards(Hand other) {
109      char[] thisCards = cards.toCharArray();
110      char[] otherCards = other.cards.toCharArray();
111      int comparison = 0;
112      for (int i = 0; i < thisCards.length && comparison == 0; i++) {
113        comparison =
114            cardEvaluator.applyAsInt(thisCards[i]) - cardEvaluator.applyAsInt(otherCards[i]);
115      }
116      return comparison;
117    }
118
119    private static Map<Integer, Long> computeFrequencies(String labels) {
120      return labels
121          .chars()
122          .boxed()
123          .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(Function.identity(), Collectors.counting()));
124    }
125
126    private static List<Integer> compileGroupCounts(
127        Map<Integer, Long> frequencies, boolean jackIsWild) {
128      int wildCount = jackIsWild ? frequencies.getOrDefault((int) JACK, 0L).intValue() : 0;
129      List<Integer> counts = frequencies
130          .entrySet()
131          .stream()
132          .filter((entry) -> !jackIsWild || entry.getKey() != JACK)
133          .sorted(Entry.<Integer, Long>comparingByValue().reversed())
134          .map((entry) -> entry.getValue().intValue())
135          .collect(Collectors.toList());
136      if (wildCount > 0) {
137        if (counts.isEmpty()) {
138          counts.add(wildCount);
139        } else {
140          counts.set(0, counts.get(0) + wildCount);
141        }
142      }
143      return counts;
144    }
145
146    private int cardValue(char card, boolean jackIsWild) {
147      return (!jackIsWild || card != JACK)
148          ? (Character.isDigit(card)
149              ? Character.getNumericValue(card)
150              : FACE_CARD_VALUES.get(card))
151          : 0;
152    }
153
154  }
155
156}
